attributes.title: BLM
attributes.review: to think hed even consider releasing this app. Its sk glitchy and doesnt even work. Not to mention that the incorporation paying for this app has the dumbest name ever. whod want that crap?? no one. This app has no reason to be active since its so glitchy and doesnt even run well/correctly.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: the apps took months to download and when it finally did trump showed up at my house and curb stomped me dragged me by the weave and sent me to conversion therapy!! pence was there but he was too busy checking trump out to help me. I DO NOT RECCOMEND THIS APP. it's crusty and there is a chance you will get herpes by downloading it 😔😔 #freebarron

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app is so so laggy and it takes three hours to download and I have perfect Wi-Fi.       And the app dose nothing for you. Title and description says that you can text Trump and obviously Trump never answers you like App is bad. Apple please take this app off the App Store

attributes.title: Whyyy
attributes.review: Literally unusable, I installed this app with the idea of continuing to support my republican ideology’s but I am bombarded with messages that are ilegible and the home page is bugged and not working. I have asked my grand kids to help but they were unable to fix it. Do not recommend

attributes.title: Should be banned
attributes.review: It took me a whole week to download this app. It just didn’t want to. I kept seeing an orange alien 🍊👽I wasn’t able to sleep for a week. I got traumatized. My mental health went down to heLL. I don’t recommend this app it’s a waste of time and phone storage 😭🤮

attributes.title: IM SO MAD AT THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: I tried to download this app to celebrate our lovely president that looks like a sweet and sour chicken nugget that was dipped in duck sauce, but when it finally finished downloading (after a week🤬) all that came up was racist, homophobic, and sexist statements quoted from out saucy president. He needs to be out of office and this app is a jokes DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!!!

attributes.title: Save TikTok
attributes.review: TikTok is the only thing I have for entertainment and if they take away TikTok I will have nothing to do plus who even likes trump he is a racist cow who never has something good to say and now I heard the trump immigration is trying to take away TikTok we will have problem 😡😢

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: This app was so slow and glitchy 😡 I cant begin to explain how mad I was. Every time I opened the app it closed immediately after. When I finally got it to open it froze my phone and I had to reset the entire thing. I DO NOT RECOMMEND IT.

attributes.title: Customer service
attributes.review: customer service is terrible! i couldn’t get into the app because of it lagging so much. and when i contacted them they said i was an ugly fat immigrant! i’m a loyal, straight, white conservative and am disgusted by these acts! i demand to be treated like a white person! not an illegal! 😡😡

attributes.title: i got covid-19 from this app!!!! 😡😡😡
attributes.review: not only did this app take ALL of quarentine to download, but when i used it people said i smelled of garbage 😭😭🤢🤢 i soon started throwing up and gagging and then i couldn’t breathe while using it!! i got rested for corona and they said it was from this app. 𝗡𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥 𝗗𝗢𝗪𝗡𝗟𝗢𝗔𝗗 𝗜𝗧.
